ExperienceSummary.Description: ~~~~~~~~~~~   is experienced in the management of:  Marketing (Data & Analytics); and Information Technology (Big Data).    ~~~~~~~~~~~   has 8 years of work experience, with 5 years of management experience, including a mid-level position.
ExperienceSummary.ManagementStory:
Current position is a mid-level management role: Own Adobe Audience Manager
Starting on 4/1/2016, the candidate held the following mid-level management position for 4 years and 8 months:
	Title: Own Adobe Audience Manager for CAMPAIGN ANALYTICS INSIGHTS AND OPTIMIZATION, MANULIFE

Name.Raw: CAMPAIGN ANALYTICS INSIGHTS AND OPTIMIZATION, MANULIFE
Name.Normalized: CAMPAIGN ANALYTICS INSIGHTS AND OPTIMIZATION MANULIFE

Positions.Description:
Responsible for producing more than 85+ in depth data reports annually
Lead a team of 3 analyst
Present strategies that will improve the quality of the campaign by exploring both quantitative and qualitative data
Own Adobe Audience Manager - was responsible for developing audiences through data analysis that could leverage and enhance KPI performance
Build test, multivariate tests and optimization strategies and deployment
Manage campaign budgets and forecast of KPI results through predictive modelling and optimizations
Pull all data and do deep dives with several platforms including: Adobe Analytics, Tableau with Alteryx integration, Google Analytics - including DCM, DMP and Search 360, Youtube, Hootsuite and internal Data-lakes
Create initiative data visualizations reports through Excel, Adobe Analytics Dashboads, Tableu and Power BI
Present reports and recommendations to various levels of the marketing teams up to SVP
Manage 3rd party vendor relations and work with them to better the campaign and contracts

Apart of Digital Analytics Association
IBM Data Science Professional Certification
Professional Tableau training

efforts to introduce and sell Adobe Marketing Cloud to Bell Canadas
Responsible for analyzing data and developing strategies in order findings to enhance customer experience
Lead a team in development of strategies
Was mandated to execute at least 10 test (a/b test, personalized messaging or enhanced experiences) per quarter
Advised on low hanging opportunities to better customer journeys and achieve quarterly profits
Liase with IT, Analytics, UX and developers to ensure a timely launch
Own and manage optimization and targeting efforts for Bell Residential
Was responsible for managing all 3rd party vendor (Adobe) as well as Agency relationships
CERTIFIED ADOBE EXPERT

Assisted Sales Reps on Contracts
Worked with External clients on producing ads required
Ensured the development, QA'ing, and launch of all campaign where met
Developed marketing calendar for production teams

LanguageCompetencies.FoundInContext: ADVERTISING, GEORGIAN COLLEGE [AND] the entire Business Division of Georgian College

QualificationsSummary:
SKILLS
• Advance Analytics (Excel, SQL Python)
• Testing/ Optimization
• Modelling
• Digital Marketing
• Building Data Visualization Reports and Stories based on data (Tableu, Power BI, Adobe Workspace)

• Personalization/ Contextualization
• Research
• Account/ Relationship Management
• Project Management
• Leadership

Findings.Message: A street level address was not found in the contact information. A full contact address should always be included in a resume as it allows for location based searches.
Every position in a resume should have an employer name.
Every degree in a resume should have a name or type associated with it, such as 'B.S.' or 'M.S.'.
High school (or lower) education should not be included on resumes that contain higher-level education.

The following section was identified as a skills section type: 'SKILLS'. Skills should not be in a separate section, but instead, each skill should be included in the descriptions of work history or education. THIS IS INCREDIBLY IMPORTANT FOR AI MATCHING ALGORITHMS

~~~~~~~~~~~  
70 Falconridge Terr., East Gwillimbury •    ~~~~~~~

I am an Analyst with more than 8 years' experience using data-driven analytics to establish a leading presence in new markets as well identify key growth opportunities. As an analyst I am detail oriented, analytical, a team player with a project management mentality and a quick learner that is always willing to serve internal and external clients.


EXPERIENCE
